text: Cial Jhaelian is the High Warden of the [[Deathguard]]. They fought against the [[line|Aereni noble line]] of [[Vol]] when that line was shattered, and continues to lead the Deathguard after death. They have a gentle demeanor, even in battle; they feel no hatred for [[Mabar]]an [[undead]], only pity.
title: Cial Jhaelian
tags: deathless [[Shae Cairdal]] elf humanoid Jhaelian Deathguard
